timeline.message:
Add more tests in GeoBoundsAggregatorTests

this commit introduces more thorough field-type support tests
as well as tests for unmapped and missing values.

relates #42949.

timeline.bodyText: This looks like it has a mapped field, just no docs indexed against it, so I don't think it's correct to call it an "Unmapped" test? or am I missing something?
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: Nit - I think it would be clearer that the aggregation isn't operating on this field if we used some completely different type, like a keyword or a number.
timeline.author: not-napoleon

timeline.bodyText: Nit - I would split this into two tests, for valid and invalid missing cases.
timeline.author: not-napoleon
